title: Boutique City Stay in Regional South Australia
description: Experience boutique excellence with a weekend getaway at Ellen Hotel, located 2.5 hours outside of Adelaide in the South Australia’s Port Pirie. With cafés, bars and restaurants within walking distance and Mount Remarkable National Park a one-hour drive away, the best of the area is within easy reach. Includes a daily breakfast pack, a bottle of wine on arrival and one entrée each at the on-site restaurant.
